job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongRolebrbrstrongTesla is looking for a strong Software Engineer to design and develop software for its current and next generations of Business Systems Applications This position will be working with the Software Engineering team in Fremont CAbrbrThe team will build the system used to supply material to the distribution and service centers It will be built with the longterm vision of being a global system to manage warehouses for all Tesla business operations which includes Vehicle Service and Energy Products This will be a businesscritical system essential to support the growth and mission of Tesla The candidate will be working in Go Angular React and MySQLbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liDesign implement and deliver endtoend fully functional solutionsli liContribute relevant clean concise quality documentation to Teslas knowledge base to support increase organizational information sharingli liAutomating your repetitive development tasksli liEvangelize best practices in Software development and Software development lifecycleli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul liBS degree in Computer Science IT or related fieldsli li4 years in Application Developmentli liRESTful API Design amp Implementationli liExperience with Automated Testingli liWeb Frontend Development using tools such as JavaScript Angular React etcli liBackend Development using tools such as Go Java Ruby etcli liDatabase knowledge such as MySQL Oracle Postgres etc li liExperience working on business services software or enterprise softwareliul
